SELECT attendance.aid, attendance.uempid, attendance.uempname, attendance.ayear, attendance.amonth, attendance.alatecome, attendance.aearlyleave, attendance.aearlycome, attendance.workovertime, attendance.aleave, attendance.bonusres, attendance.wovertime, attendance.hovertime FROM attendance
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance VALUES (#{aid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uempid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uempname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ayear, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amonth, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{alatecome, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{aearlyleave, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{aearlycome, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workovertime, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{aleave, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bonusres, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{wovertime, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hovertime, jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: SELECT salary_set.basesalary FROM salary_set LEFT JOIN attendance ON attendance.aid = #{aid} LEFT JOIN `user` ON `user`.uid = attendance.uempid LEFT JOIN employee ON employee.uempid = attendance.uempid WHERE salary_set.deptnum = employee.deptnum AND salary_set.role = `user`.role
